mapper.select: select cm.b_num, cm.cm_num, cm.m_id as cm_m_id, cm.cm_contents, cm.cm_wdate, cm.cm_udate, cm.cm_secret, cm.cm_del , cms.cms_num, b.m_id as b_m_id, cms.cms_contents, cms.cms_wdate, cms.cms_udate, cms.cms_del from comm cm, comm_sub cms, b_match b where cm.cm_num = cms.cm_num(+) and b.b_num = cm.b_num and b.b_num = #{b_num} order by cm.cm_num desc

select cm.b_num, cm.cm_num, cm.m_id as cm_m_id, cm.cm_contents, cm.cm_wdate, cm.cm_udate, cm.cm_secret, cm.cm_del from comm cm, b_match b where b.b_num = cm.b_num and cm.cm_del = 'N' and b.b_num = #{b_num} order by cm.cm_num desc

select cm.b_num, cm.cm_num, cm.m_id as cm_m_id, cm.cm_secret, cm.cm_del , cms.cms_num, b.m_id as cms_m_id, cms.cms_contents, cms.cms_wdate, cms.cms_udate, cms.cms_del from comm cm, comm_sub cms, b_match b where cm.cm_num = cms.cm_num and b.b_num = cm.b_num and cms.cms_del = 'N' and cm.cm_num = #{cm_num} order by cms.cms_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into comm (cm_num, b_num, m_id, cm_contents, cm_secret) values (seq_cm.nextval, #{b_num}, #{cm_m_id}, #{cm_contents}, #{cm_secret})
insert into comm_sub (cms_num, cm_num, cms_contents) values (seq_cms.nextval, #{cm_num}, #{cms_contents})
mapper.update: update comm set cm_udate = sysdate , cm_del = 'Y' where cm_num = #{cm_num}
update comm_sub set cms_udate = sysdate , cms_del = 'Y' where cms_num = #{cms_num}
mapper.select: select count(cm.cm_num) from comm cm, b_match b where b.b_num = cm.b_num and cm_del = 'N' and b.b_num = #{b_num}
select count(cms.cms_num) from comm cm, comm_sub cms, b_match b where cm.cm_num = cms.cm_num and b.b_num = cm.b_num and cms.cms_del = 'N' and b.b_num = #{b_num}
